review: very fun!!! been a fan since ow1 and turning it from a 6v6 to a 5v5 made it way more enjoyable, and the devs seem to care more about the content they make now compared to the last few years of ow1 and the PvE is really fun both the free and paid ones. a lot of the comments say the pressure you into paying them but if you have even an ounce of self-control you won't feel pressured to buy anything you don't want, and while paying $20 for a skin is insane imo, at least it's not $30 for a gun skin like valorant ğŸ¤®ğŸ¤® lol
